data.text: @MArmenoff @KatMcPheeNews @katharinemcphee As far as I'm concerned, it doesn't affect our cause at all. One or 2 cast members not coming back has been a possibility from the start. We have to concentrate on the show as a whole. #SaveScorpion
@MArmenoff @KatMcPheeNews @DouglasHespelt @katharinemcphee Sorry to say, I'm sure she stopped being interested the moment it was canceled
@KatMcPheeNews @DouglasHespelt @katharinemcphee How does this effect our #SaveScorpion campaign?  Would Kat still be interested at all?
